Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_CrimsonProvoca.label: Crimson Provocation
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_CrimsonProvoca.description: Use the distinction for flesh entity and other entity to prepare unique offerings, creating psychic waves specifically designed to attract these flesh entities - like a void provocation, but crimson.
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_CrimsonProvoca.outcomeDescription: With the current quality, there's a {0} chance the invoker will receive dark psychic shock.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_SummonSwarms.label: Draw Entity Swarms
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_SummonSwarms.description: Using special meat as bait triggers a pulse that attracts insects in a particular state. The use of this ritual is not theoretically designed for human use, and its effects can be somewhat disturbing.
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_SummonSwarms.outcomeDescription: The higher the ritual quality, the more swarms that will be summoned.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_SummonClumps.label: Draw Clumps
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_SummonClumps.description: Create a psychic pulse which will draw a distant horde of Clumps towards your local area. These Clumps will arrive after some time with hunger, and it is recommended that you have carcasses ready for them to eat, or be prepared to turn them into corpses.
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_SummonClumps.outcomeDescription: The higher the ritual quality, the more Clumps that will be summoned.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_SummonRawProph.label: Thirst Gate
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_SummonRawProph.description: By following the steps below, we can summon that smelly and sticky prophet. First, offer blood-forged steel to create a psychic pulse; then kill an innocent sacrifice to please the thirsty gate with its death and flesh; finally, guide the psychic energy to the fleshmass nucleus closest to the ritual site, destroy it and replace the monster.\n\n It will appear in the center of the ritual, which is dangerous, but we can temporarily restrain it to buy a few preparation times.
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_SummonRawProph.outcomeDescription: With the current quality，we are able to restrain the Raw Prophet for {0} seconds.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_ExileRawProphe.label: Exile Prophet
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_ExileRawProphe.description: Similar to summoning the raw prophet, we can sacrifice a victim to open the Thirst Gate again, banishing the uncontained raw prophet back to that terrible space. This time, fewer sacrifices are required, and if we have already caused it enough damage, it will not take the strange object it has not yet dropped.\n\n It don't work in unnatural darkness.
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_ExileRawProphe.outcomeDescription: With the current quality, there's a {0} chance the invoker will receive dark psychic shock.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_AkulothRitual.label: Akuloth Symbiosis
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_AkulothRitual.description: The victim is sacrificed through a bloody ritual so that the person conducting the ritual can successfully achieve symbiosis with the akuloth.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_InitiationRitu.label: Initiation Ritual
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_InitiationRitu.description: Grants enlightenment to the target of the ritual, allowing it to become a glorious Orin.
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_InitiationRitu.outcomeDescription: The target will gain trait of Orin.\n\nWith the current quality, if the invoker isn's a Sarkicism, the target's skills will also be reduced by {0}.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagyKnowl.label: Theophagy Ritual (Phost)
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagyKnowl.description: "The sacramental consumption of a god." We feed on the reshaped remains of things forged by the twisted and the archo, and seek to draw from them knowledge of the flesh or void.
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagyKnowl.outcomeDescription: With the current quality, will gain a random {0} points of Flesh Anomaly knowledge, or less of other knowledge. But if we don't have the right anomaly projects to study, the invoker might glimpse inappropriate and horrific knowledge or even fall into dark psychic shock.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagySatis.label: Theophagy Ritual (Satisfaction)
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagySatis.description: "The sacramental consumption of a god." We feed on the reshaped remains of things forged by the twisted and the archo, and learn the secret that frees us from hunger and thirst.
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagySatis.outcomeDescription: With the current quality, all of participants in the ritual will become very less likely to get hungry for the next {0} hours, but once this effect ends, they will become very hungry within the next hour.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagyKnock.label: Theophagy Ritual (KnockHeart)
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagyKnock.description: "The sacramental consumption of a god." We feed on the reshaped remains of things forged by the twisted and the archo, and through this act, attempt to open a dimensional rift that will transfer the fleshmass heart to the shallow depths of this place.
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagyKnock.outcomeDescription: With the current quality, there's a {0} chance the invoker will receive dark psychic shock. If there's no place for the dimensional rift to open, the invoker will receive dark psychic shock as well.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagyChor.label: Theophagy Ritual (Chor)
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagyChor.description: "The sacramental consumption of a god." We feed on the reshaped remains of things forged by the twisted and the archo, and give the invoker exuberance; instinct; rhythm... giving invoker the power to avoid pain.
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagyChor.outcomeDescription: With the current quality, the invoker will gain or increase {0} points of rapid regeneration.

Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagySilen.label: Theophagy Ritual (Silence)
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagySilen.description: "The sacramental consumption of a god." We feed on the reshaped remains of things forged by the twisted and the archo, and cause those who are dead to die again. (Kill all of shambler at this map.)
Luna_BRF.PsychicRitualDef_TheophagySilen.outcomeDescription: With the current quality, there's a {0} chance the invoker will receive dark psychic shock.

PsychicRitualRoleDef.label: victim
PsychicRitualRoleDef.description: As a sacrifice of the ritual, this unfortunate fellow will cease to exist regardless of whether the ritual succeeds or not.
